title: "Zika Microsyvali" is an explosion caused by Monsanto Pistid?
subtitle: There is an unfounded theory that refers to Monsanto pesticide that caused a rise in precision births in Brazil that reached a turning point when it was promoted by George Taki.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Doctors believe that the increase in the number of accurate cases in Brazil is due to the use of a Monsanto pesticide.
